question: 心配する
sourceAnswer: To Worry, To Be Concerned, To Be Anxious
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>心配</ja> is "a worry." What about the verb version of that? It would be <vocabulary>to worry</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes straight from <ja>心配</ja> so try to make sure you know that word so you can read this word! It's also all jukugo on'yomi reading, too, so you should be able to figure it out regardless.
